title: Turn the app into a simple multi-page website experience

requirements.text: Add basic website navigation so users can move between primary pages from a consistent header (at minimum: Home and Search).
acceptanceCriteria: A persistent header navigation is visible on all pages.
Users can navigate to Home and Search using the header without full page reloads.
Navigation works on mobile and desktop layouts.

requirements.text: Create a website-style Home page layout that clearly explains what the site is and provides a primary call-to-action to use the existing search experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page contains at least: a hero section (headline + short description) and a primary CTA that routes into the Search flow.
Layout is responsive and readable on narrow screens.
No broken links or placeholder lorem ipsum text remain.

requirements.text: Add a consistent website footer with basic site links (e.g., Home, Search) and a short copyright line.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer is present across the main pages.
Footer styling matches the rest of the site and works in both light and dark mode (if supported by the existing theme).

requirements.text: Apply a single, coherent visual theme across the website (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) with a distinct style that is used consistently on Home, Search Home, and Search Results pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Home, Search Home, and Search Results share consistent typography and spacing scale.
Buttons, inputs, and links have consistent styling and hover/focus states.
The theme does not use a blue/purple dominant palette unless already present in the current design tokens.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components); compose them instead.
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths; implement changes using other components/pages.
Backend remains a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not add third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Do not add real-time features (WebSockets/push notifications).
Do not introduce external databases or non-Motoko backend services.
